name: Stereograph Museum VR
description:
Step into a mesmerizing world of vintage 3D wonder with Stereograph Museum VR, an enchanting virtual reality experience that transports you back in time to explore a captivating collection of 1200+ high resolution antique 3D stereograph images. Immerse yourself in the magic of the past as you embark on an awe-inspiring journey through the annals of history. Stereo image pairs are magically combined into a single 3D image in VR.

Subjects:
  • Civil War
  • United States
  • Japan
  • South East Asia
  • South Asia
  • Oceania
  • Middle America
  • South America
  • Canada
  • China
  • World War I
  • Europe
  • Africa
  • Disaster
  • Humor
  • Custom

Add your own custom Stereographs and view them in VR!
